newsitem.title: JAPAN: Ajinomoto ask-only after probe reports.
newsitem.headline: Ajinomoto ask-only after probe reports.

text.p: Shares in Ajinomoto Co Inc were ask-only at the start of the afternoon session on Tuesday, depressed by media reports that Ajinomoto was being investigated for suspected sokaiya links, traders said.
The share price of Ajinomoto, a manufacturer of foodstuffs and seasonings, was ask-only at 990 yen at 0350 GMT. The shares ended the morning session up 20 yen at 1,030.
Kyodo news agency reported during the midsession break that police are investigating Ajinomoto on suspicion that it provided money to "sokaiya" racketeers in violation of Japan's commercial law.
Ajinomoto was not immediately available for comment. Police declined to comment on the report.
